content.raw:
After thinking twice on how to test this, I've modified the any script to allow ARCH parameter, I think is the best way and easiest for testing this stuff.

This is the first run, I would say that the fail is expected due to missing `-DUSE_ATLASSIMINTERFACE_BLOB:BOOL=False`:
http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/drcsim-any-devel-precise-amd64/54/console

I will modify the script to pass that variable to the test on i386.
